description: Designed to streamline project workflows for freelancers and small businesses, ResMon combines time tracking with project management features in a user-friendly platform. Gain insights into productivity and manage projects with ease, all in one place.

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: go build -tags 'netgo sqlite_stat4 sqlite_fts5 sqlite_math_functions sqlite_vtable'
scripts.build:backend_dev: go build -race -tags 'netgo sqlite_stat4 sqlite_fts5 sqlite_math_functions sqlite_vtable'
scripts.build_dev: npm run build:frontend_dev && npm run build:backend_dev
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:elm && npm run cleanup:github && npm run cleanup:go && npm run cleanup:gql && npm run cleanup:sass && npm run cleanup:sql && npm run cleanup:web
scripts.dev: npm run build_dev && npx concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: go run -race -tags 'netgo sqlite_stat4 sqlite_fts5 sqlite_math_functions sqlite_vtable' main.go --dev
scripts.generate: npm run generate:elm && npm run generate:model && npm run generate:graph
scripts.generate:graph: npm run generate:graph:go && npm run generate:graph:elm
scripts.generate:graph:elm: npm run touch:webroot && go run main.go --generate-elm-graphql-schema
scripts.review: npm run review:elm && npm run review:go && npm run review:model
scripts.review:go: npm run build:frontend && go vet -tags 'netgo sqlite_stat4 sqlite_fts5 sqlite_math_functions sqlite_vtable'
scripts.test: npm run test:elm && npm run review && npm run build && npm run test:go
scripts.test:go: npm run build:frontend && go test -race -tags 'netgo sqlite_stat4 sqlite_fts5 sqlite_math_functions sqlite_vtable'
